website_summaries.verdict: High-pigment formula with over 20 shades from industry leader. Heavy, buildable coverage hides tattoos and pigmentation.
pros: Creamy, almost waxy formula stays put all day
Easy to find your shade with manufacturer color chart
Comes with spatula for easy dispensing
Popular for hiding acne scars and birthmarks
cons: Takes time to achieve desired coverage, so there’s a learning curve with application — though it’s worth every second and penny

customer_reviews.title: Have used for many years! Flawless!
customer_reviews.text: The only foundation I use! Everyone says my skin looks flawless. It covers my dark circles and imperfections! I have used this for many many years. See pictures. I also use a setting powder and another powder to make sure it's set perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Deena Martin

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True Dermablend
customer_reviews.text: I have actually used Dermablend Cover Creme for many years and have always been very pleased with its coverage. It does last all day and the key is to select the right shade for your skin tone. Luckily, a large number of skin tones is available. Although the amount in the container seems rather small, it lasts for months and months. Therefore, it is also very economical. Finally, it does not cake and is very sheer, but still covers any discoloration on the face very well.
customer_reviews.author: design 360

customer_reviews.title: OK but the Original line was better
customer_reviews.text: This is not the original Dermablend which had been around for ages. The company was sold and the color range is different and darker than the original and is also smoother to apply. It must be used with a colorless setting powder (any brand will do) to last for hours. Oily skinned people might have to reapply more frequently This is heavy makeup and I only use it occasionally for spot treatment. I find their body makeup covers better. If you have very pale skin, you will have a hard time finding a match. I would not recommend this brand if you are acne prone. The ingredient list could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for facial hair
customer_reviews.text: Wow. If you need to cover some things up, look no further. Tbh, i am a trans woman currently going through laser facial hair removal, and this stuff is life saving. I have a few spots of facial hair that were showing through my old CoverGirl foundation. This stuff makes it all disappear. Completely. I am simply amazed. I only have to use a tiny bit of Dermablend for my whole face. This might cost 5 times as much as my old foundation, but it's 20x more effective and I use like 1% of my Dermablend each day, instead of like 10% of my old foundation. And my makeup looks 1,000x better! I wish I learned about this stuff sooner
customer_reviews.author: Amy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage. Requires patient effort to blend. Limited color range.
customer_reviews.text: Good foundation. High coverage but be prepared to spend time blending and buffing to avoid cake face. Lasted the whole day on my normal to dry skin. I did set it with powder. The reason for 3 stars is because the color selection can be tricky. I purchased yellow beige which was described as for light skin with yellow undertones, in my opinion this would be for medium skin. The color range is not extensive and the difference between one shade to the next is quite a jump. The ideal shade for a given individual would be a mix, which I think professionals do all the time. I’m not so impressed that I’d purchase 2 shades to custom mix.
customer_reviews.author: RYWTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Best foundation I've bought yet , sometimes I have to keep patting it on my dark spot because it doesn't stay in place but this is overall my favorite foundation. Matches my skin tone to the T and feels lightweight and I don't have to use that much product.
customer_reviews.author: lvcedstvcks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing makeup
customer_reviews.text: This makeup is amazing, the coverage for me is the best I’ve ever found. I’ve been hesitate to get this because I thought the makeup would be very thick and heavy, WRONG!!️!!️!!️The creaminess and lightness is perfect for the Louisiana humidity and the color works well with my fair skin. I have deep sprinkles across my cheeks and I’ve been embarrassed by them, I’m not a “Botox” kind of woman so I was desperate to find something that worked. I’m so pleased with Dermablend. Ladies, don’t hesitate like I did, buy this product and start getting your confidence back by being pleased with what you see in the mirror!!️!!️🥰🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Shades are weird
customer_reviews.text: Horrible color and way too thick. Couldn't get the right shade for anything. This would only be good for major scars or discoloration or tattoos. Good luck finding a shade that fits
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Best Coverage out there.
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, I have so many acne scars and sun discoloration, but this gives me a great base. Covers everything! My sister in law used it to cover her full chest tattoo for her wedding. It was amazing how well it really covered. Water proof, love this product, apply in the morning and wear all day. Can't say enough about the coverage. It's a miracle worker. be sure to get the setting powder as it is pretty heavy duty and needs something to really seal it.
customer_reviews.author: Lix

customer_reviews.title: Good but don’t expect a miracle
customer_reviews.text: It is full coverage but not like they advertise. It’s the same as any other full coverage foundation. It’s by no means a miracle maker. The shades are lighter than they look online. If you’re debating between two shades go with the darker shade. If you have dry skin you might find it too caked. Also the key to its longevity isn’t the product itself it is the setting powder. If you want it to last and not rub off on everything or smear you must use the loose setting powder.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fornaro

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit, molded green and fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: I believe I bought a fake product, my Warm beige had nasty almond smell, green started popping up on the top of the product & a white fuzzy thing. I paid $40! I threw it away after 6 weeks my face still has rash & breakouts. Now warm beige is NO WHERE! That's my color... I bought a lighter one this time. Went to the company then lot# thru Amazon. U should be assuring authentic product! Not counterfeits!
customer_reviews.author: JustaDudeTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic coverage with sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: When I removed the product from the container the texture surprised me. I put it on the back of my hand and applied it to my face that way. I am very pleased with how easy it spread and how well it covered my sun spots. The fact it has sunscreen in it is a huge plus so that I can avoid getting new sun spots. I bought ivory with cool tones. You have to use so little I think the container will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing! Does not cover imperfections.
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to try Dermablend face makeup foundation. I finally tried it and I have to say I was so disappointed. I don't have many imperfections, but I did have one little area on my nose that I wanted to cover. This Foundation does not live up to all of the hype it's been putting out there for years. I did read some of the reviews that are similar to mine, but figured I would give it a chance. $39 for this Foundation is way, way overpriced. I am going back to my regular Foundation that I buy at the local CVS Pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: Rainier

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for many years and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years and it has done me well. I used to purchase it at Macy's in Washington, DC but the Dermablend counters are all gone from all major stores. As a last resort I looked on Amazon and there it was. My color is warm saffron as I am of mixed race and need some yellow or golden in any type of facial make-up
customer_reviews.author: C.B. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Dark spots disappear
customer_reviews.text: I love love love Dermablend! I used to purchase at our local mall, but why go and fight traffic when you can have delivered straight to your home. This product is a full coverage foundation that I use as a concealer. Believe me it works.... I have some dark problem areas on my face in the dimples area. All I do is pat not rub, a small amount and poof they disappear. I use the setting powder too. My 73 yr old mom uses as a foundation and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: D T

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I have severe pcos and I keep trying products that claim to be full coverage and it's very upsetting. This is very cake and I used exactly as directed and the setting powder. It's a mess. Cannot believe I invested this much on one foundation
customer_reviews.author: krista moore

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected at all. I bought this product to help camouflage a bruise and perhaps a tattoo. It did not cover to the degree I expected. The bruise and tattoo were still visible and after a couple of hours they were completely visible. It does not dry, it stays tacky so a powder or setting spray is definitely needed. Is not water resistant. I would not recommend this product for the price. Any cake make up would do the same. I would not buy again. 40 bucks wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Karen O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am over the top happy with this product. It is a bit costly, but well worth it. When you factor in the tiny bit that you have to use, it goes a long way. On cool days, you must put a dab on the palm of your hand and allow the make up to soften. During some of our warmer days, this was not necessary. The coverage is perfection. Once warmed, it applies very smoothly. It is best to use a primer before application, I have found. The amount will last a long, long time, given how little you have to use.
customer_reviews.author: Summerof69

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for years and recommended it to many people.
customer_reviews.text: Learned of this company and products because of my nursing profession. It works very well for scars or other discolorations. I have very fair skill and have a few areas of discoloration on face that bother me. I use a dab of this and powder over it and am good for the day. It stays where it put it and doesn't melt or disappear in a few hours. A friend dealing with roseola was delighted to find it, as she was always being asked by clients if something was wrong with her skin.
customer_reviews.author: surv53

customer_reviews.title: SO DISAPPOINTED! Update!!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I bought some face primer and locking powder to keep it on my face. The coverage held up better, but it still began to look mottled and started separating. It's going back..... First, the coverage was good. Choosing a color was a guessing game, but I somehow managed to do pick a decent on for me for winter. It feels VERY heavy on. It looked good for a while, but became splotchy and dotted looking. I felt like my face was sliding off. Talk about a dream dasher.... I hate wasting money 😢
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, I think it was rancid.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. It was very difficult to spread, seemed almost dried out. Never again. It smelled strange, like it was spoiled. I am a medical professional. I know spoiled when I smell spoiled. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: rainbow

customer_reviews.title: THE FORMULA has been CHANGED and is causing me to have an allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new pot in December 2019. I've been using this product for years and it does an excellent job of covering the minor hypo-pigmentation I have. If applied with a good sponge it looks natural. Upon using the fresh pot, I discovered the COMPANY HAS CHANGED THE FORMULA. It's creamier AND it is causing an allergic reaction. Whenever I use it I get a rash which is gone within 24 hours, but is unbearable while it lasts. I hope I can find a replacement product.
customer_reviews.author: MLK

customer_reviews.title: Dermablend.  Beautiful foundation for a flawless look.
customer_reviews.text: Dermablend does all it is supposed to do ...and much more. I have used this cover creme for many many years and will continue to do so. It is pure and it works very well for me as I have many allergies. Dermablend may be applied as a light film or as a complete cover makeup. It does not clog the pores and is easy to remove. My daughters and many friends use Dermablend because they liked what I can do with it...there is a good choice of colours to choose from. Dermablend makes skin look and feel flawless, I love my Dermablend!
customer_reviews.author: Sheighle Birdthistle

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product before and I like it a lot. It covers up dark spots and discoloration well. It actually makes my skin look smoother. I like the fact that it feels light and it lasts a long time. This brand of makeup is the only makeup I use as I am not one for wearing makeup all the time. I am very selective about my makeup as I have very sensitive skin and cannot wear just any kind of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my red face
customer_reviews.text: This make up was exactly what I was looking for and I love it, it covers redness and sun spots really well, I would not recommend this for people looking for a sheer thin makeup but this is perfect for Lupus rash or redness that regular makeup won’t cover!
customer_reviews.author: Oldsoul10*foxy11!

customer_reviews.title: Flawless coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have melasma on my face, and for a long time, I have used many foundations from cheap to expensive. Finally, I found a foundation that is absolutely great. I use a primer first, then the Dermablend Cover cream and my skin looks naturally flawless. I do use a finishing powder so that my face doesn't feel sticky. A small amount of the Dermablend will cover a lot. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tropical Cannonball

customer_reviews.title: The best cover up ever love it !!️
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this makeup and put it on on my red spots or any imperfections I may have at day then I used my regular makeup on top of it covers those spots all day for sure it's just break for that or if you have a little boo boo on your arm or leg it works great on those things too. I highly recommend this stuff worth the money left for months maybe even here depending on usage I can't find anything else like it and don't even try now because this is so perfect. I've tried their makeup which is also outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Sally J. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years. Lasts a long time. Doesn't irritate skin. Adds a nice cover to discoloration on face. Be advised it is thick so recommend you use a makeup sponge with it to apply
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Dermablend
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about Dermablend. It works magic against any skin imperfection. If you're looking for a product that will hide dark circles under your eyes or anything like that, you won't at all be disappointed with Dermablend. Well worth the money because this stuff really does last forever. Going 6 months and strong. Use under or over powder or liquid foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Happy, But ....
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this product and have used it for years. However, this latest batch doesn't have the coverage as it did in the past. It goes on a lot smoother and that's great, but lacks in coverage. For instance, I never had to use any kind of concealer while using the old product but, with this latest version, I certainly need to. Anyway, I'm mostly happy with it but disappointed in the change the company made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with allergies, looks great but use very little
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to everything else, including all other colors, so this is it for me. Pale Ivory. During the summer, it is obviously too light, so I use it extremely sparingly. It is not UV 20, I always need a separate sun block. It shows up in pictures, so be very careful, It can accentuate eye wrinkles, so again be careful. It gives good coverage, is very smooth to apply, unfortunately it will stick to everything in your surrounding, like your phone, tablet etc. A good idea is to fix it with powder. I use laura mercier as I am not allergic to that powder.. If you have skin allergies, then this foundation is axcellent..
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Good product but.....
customer_reviews.text: I've used Dermablend Cover Creme for years . I made a mistake and ordered what i thought would be a shade darker than i normally wear, but it was lighter. I gave it to a fair skinned friend and will be reordering the correct shade soon. Dermablend Cover Creme covers birthmarks, blemishes and gives you a flawless finish. It lasts all day and night until you remove it.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: I love Dermablend
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a huge fan of Dermablend because their products actually cover scars. The price is honestly worth it. In the morning I use Dermablend primer before the cover creme and the makeup stays on al day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this make up
customer_reviews.text: I love this make up. I really don't have bad blemishes nor dark spots but I hate that thick feeling most make up has so I decided to try this. It literally takes a few swipes to cover my entire face. I feel as if I am not wearing make up but the even tone is much better than my own natural tone. It does cover well and doesn't wear off during my day.I do use a powder when I want a heavier coverage but find that I don't usually even need the powder.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money please!
customer_reviews.text: Greasy and even with the powder, transfers everywhere. Transfers more than drugstore makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Queen 👑💎

customer_reviews.title: Love this foundation better than MAC
customer_reviews.text: I’m dark skin, I don’t like MAC. It’s too red. This foundation appears orange, but when blended, it’s natural looking. The right shade. I’m really excited about this foundation. I have dry skin, so I use a little oil primer with it. For me, it has a dewy glow. However, I did put on too much the first time and felt oily. I use 80W. It definitely can be worn all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I break out extremely bad! This product i LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I am very sensitive to any kind of foundation, lotions or anything on my face. I break out extremely bad! This product i LOVE! I had no irritation issues and in fact it has helped my complection. Very easy and BLENDABLE! A little amount goes a long long way. This will last over a month. Love it and will definitely re order more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: ~Louise~

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover surgical scars
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple, long surgical scars on my leg. Unfortunately this product is not good at covering up my ugly scars. My surgical scars are still very visible even with multiple layers of this product on my skin. I specifically had bought this product to cover up my scars during the summer... Oh well. On the other hand, this is a great product for my face. It blends perfectly with my skin tone to cover blemishes, sun damage, and veins under my skin. I set this makeup with regular, store brand loose powder and the coverage lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cover
customer_reviews.text: I've seen and this produce for 25 years and was so happy to find it on Amazon as it does get expensive. Covers my port wine stain birthmark perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a product review of this and couldn’t wait to try it. It was not for me. I have dry, aging (early 40’s) skin and this is not a good base for the foundation. It didn’t spread well, was patchy and looked horrible on me. Like, couldn’t even wear it out of the house bad. If you have dry skin, stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and good coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I like this foundation because it goes on very smoothly with a high density brush. It is not too liquidy so it is easy to spread with a brush. It also gives very good coverage. However, I’m disappointed that they don’t have this color (warm beige), anymore...It was the perfect color for me...
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT work as advertised. It's suppose to be able to cover tatoos, but it doesn't even cover my blemishes. And if I put more than one layer on, it makes me look orange. The color match is not accurate for my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: MRSUNERSTOOD

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is actually pretty amazing coverage-wise
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is actually pretty amazing coverage-wise, but it's really difficult to apply because you can't use a brush and have to dip a finger into it and then put it on...for some people that may be okay, but my preferred method of application is using a brush so it ends up being several steps to get this on.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Russo

customer_reviews.title: Bad texture: Dermablend Cover Creme Full Coverage 10oz
customer_reviews.text: The texture of this product is really bad for women of color... The consistency is overload ! its like casket makeup... better to just use it for covering scars under original foundation but this should def not be your go to for a nice beat face. Oh yeah and a little goes a LONG way all you need is less then a dime size amount and it will cover your entire face.
customer_reviews.author: Deja

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m a little disappointed. The coverage at first is good. However, the warmth of my skin almost seems to melt this makeup throughout my day and by the end I feel greasy and my makeup appears to be gone in the key areas I needed it most. I had pretty high hopes because of the price. I figured if I paid more I’d get a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mama•bee

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my face because I have a lot of dark spots. It blends very well, easy to spread. If you have very very moist skin and you sweat a lot this is not the product for you. It will run and dirty the collar of your shirts. If you wear this on your face please don't stay in the sun, your face will melt!! Very good product. It covers a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy1

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from this product. I had a bruise on my face from a dermatology procedure. It didn't completely cover the bruise, even with a couple of applications with the setting powder. In a short time it would melt and disappear. I used dermablend many years ago and it worked perfectly and lasted all day. Guess the formula has been changed. On a positive side its difficult to color match my complexion but the color was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: LONG wearing, Excellent coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to Dermablend from my Father, over 30 YEARS AGO, to cover a tattoo which it did very well. For me? I have dark bruises and age spots on my arms from taking blood thinners. Stays put, up to 2 days if I don't shower. Also, it doesn't rub off on clothing. If the color doesn't match your skin tone EXACTLY, they will replace it until it's right. My color is perfect, dark bruises, invisible. Best product I have ever found. A bit pricey but my previous jar lasted 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Diekmann

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: The coverage is amazing and lasts all day. I use another setting powder but I’ll order dermablend powder when I run out. I feel like this pot will lasts a long time too. I’ve had it for several weeks now and it still looks like it’s barely used. I have acne scars and adult rosacea and with dermablend you can hardly tell.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like to wear a mask
customer_reviews.text: this is more like a thick clay than a makeup. I had to mix in some moisturizer to be able to apply it to my face. The product is much to thick and heavy for the daily wear I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Heath

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’d heard about the good coverage Dermablend is known for and this did not cover well at all.
customer_reviews.author: abklyngirl

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin, I have been using KVD Lock it foundation for a couple years but I wanted to try something new. Unfortunately, even with primer this really made my skin look blotchy and feel really tight and dry and just overall looked really unnatural and chalky on me. If you have dry skin and are looking for a good full coverage foundation I strongly recommend Kat Von D's foundation. This dermablend foundation is definitely best suited for people with normal skin.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely a different texture than I expected- but I really like it. Lucked out and ordered the PERFECT color for my skin. I honestly just use it on my problem areas. It’s a little more greasy feeling than expected, but still soft and light. Full coverage too. Ordered 15C
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent coverage
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good at covering dark spots and redness. You do have to take some time to get good at applying I only use it on the spots I need to cover, then go over my whole face with my regular foundation. If I use this on my whole face, it looks too heavy and cakey.
customer_reviews.author: D.Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Buy a little lighter than you think
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup. I had to go back and buy a second because the first was too dark. It is expensive but you don't need to use much. I decided in the summer I will mix the two colors so the first one won't be a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: louise Anne

customer_reviews.title: It's the best concealer I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an under eye concealer. It's the best concealer I've ever used. I know what color to purchase as I initially purchased this at a make up counter where the precise color was professionally decided for me. I recommend going to a place where they sell it first. Now, I just buy it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Have been through quite a few store-bought products and nothing has ever compared to this I was so amazed with this I would tell anyone to buy this
customer_reviews.author: Tandra

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 25N and it was a perfect match. Really good coverage for discoloration...HOWEVER this is not for people who dont have perfect texture. If your skin is dry, you will see every imperfection, crease, and pore. Looks good from far away, but up close and in the sun, your skin will look chalky.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, lousy service
customer_reviews.text: I am a devotee and absolutely love this product. The only thing I’m unhappy about is the product came used- about 3-4 applications worth scooped out. At least they used the applicator, or so it appears. I would have thought Amazon would have better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: MPD_Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not like the old Dermablend!
customer_reviews.text: This does not cover dark marks like the old Dermablend did, unless you want to really cake it on. Do yourself a favor and buy Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Eraser Dark Circles Treatment Concealer for around $7.00 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J.

customer_reviews.title: hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I found this covering creme to be hard to use and it didn't cover redness on my cheeks. It is very hard to get off the face and even after makeup remover pads and soap and water and toner, some makeup still remained. It made my face break out as well. I can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Try It!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Dermablend for many years and find it to a be very good foundation. I purchase two of the best shades for my complexion then mix them to create a darker shade for summer in one jar and lighter winter in the other jar. Dermablend foundation lasts all day and very rarely need to be reapplied...even in the summer heat. I recommend Dermablend to any looking for medium long lasting coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I use a make-up sponge
customer_reviews.text: Needed a foundation with SPF. Found this and gave it a try. I love it. I use a make-up sponge, and blend blend blend just a little. Hoping to stop getting dark spots from being outside so much. Last makeup didn't have SPF. This is great quality, hides the spots I have, and hopefully will keep me from getting more.
customer_reviews.author: nlh

customer_reviews.title: the area didn't blend well or look like skin when done
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help cover a tattoo as it shows that it will do. It made the skin look very artificial, the area didn't blend well or look like skin when done. I attempted several times and it never worked. It was returned without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Best full coverage foundation I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Dermablend cover creme hides what you need to cover, while giving you a fresh look for the entire day. I use it every day, and it never cakes or runs. It gives you a flawless looking face that lasts until you remove it. People often mention what perfect skin I have. I never tell them it is all due to Dermablend 'Cover Creme
customer_reviews.author: First Sister

customer_reviews.title: Great for problem skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, but didn't care for it for my aging skin...but my daughter LOVES it for covering get acne and scars. Does need setting powder to make it budge proof. Best to apply with brush
customer_reviews.author: faeryfriendz

customer_reviews.title: Dream crusher
customer_reviews.text: Terrible coverage... I thought this was the best of the best... Color too orange. Did NOT cover my scar even with powder and another application. Sent it back because it was simply awful. My hopes were crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Extremely THICK and hard to apply
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me, but I couldn't figure out a way to apply this very, very thick makeup without it looking ridiculous. And I know how to apply makeup. I should have returned it - I will never use this product. I must say: the jar is HUGE so if you're a fan, you'll be set for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brinkerhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin and uneven bits on my face. Dermablend is a miracle worker at covering up my imperfections without irritating my sensitive skin. I can't recommend it enough. It might seem a bit expensive but it lasts forever. I had one jar over a year and it was still working fine with a lot left. I just figured it's time to update and bought a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger

customer_reviews.title: color is off!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not bad but color is not what is described! It is totally pink!!! I am trying to return but have difficulties with refund and pick up! Will not buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: seeker

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product and I was happy to get it a little cheaper than the department store price. It comes in the original box and is the real deal. The most difficult part is choosing the right shade for proper coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amy White

customer_reviews.title: Overhyped product
customer_reviews.text: This product does cover my large dark tattoos, BUT BUT BUT... the transferring is REALLY BAD. It stained my clothes so now those have to go to the cleaners. I had to use my own foundation and setting powder to make it blend with my skin and let it set. If I am paying for a higher end product, the transfer rate should be lower.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Know what your actual color is for your skin tone.
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered the wrong color. Ordered a different color, on the next color grid, blended the two and all is fine. Product is very difficult to find in retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Been using for more than 15yrs great Product, waterproof, natural look, once You apply setting powder, cover cream Stays on all day, sleep still on, until wash off .
customer_reviews.author: myg14

customer_reviews.title: the product would be better. It's not
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this in the past for covering scars and I had hoped, that years later, the product would be better. It's not. Stay Matte, by Rimmel, covered what I needed covered much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Kidgie

customer_reviews.title: Coverage is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage! My spots are pretty dark but it’s not as noticeable now that I can cover it up a bit. Helps me to feel a little comfortable without be self conscious about my dark spots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Increadible coverage!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! It's opaque coverage blends perfectly to cover scars naturally and is long wearing, truly waterproof, and smudge resistant. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: SBC1

customer_reviews.title: eye creasing
customer_reviews.text: it is a great product but creases near immediately under teh eye and any where else on your face you may have wrinkles, use concealer and skin fillers and pore fillers so your imperfections are not highlighted but yes other wise this stuff is good to your skin
customer_reviews.author: uppity

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Covers hyper pigmentation | uneven skin very well. I recommend using a small amount, like a primer, and using another layer of your normal used foundation, after. Does NOT act like a putty for pores | small scars, even though it is reviewed like that on the net. It's a good product nevertheless, easy to choose colors. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gabianza

customer_reviews.title: Why did you change the shade numbers?
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this product for 30 years and you changed the shade numbers . I needed to convert my shade of 5 1/2 to 75W. And then when I received my makeup it still shows the shade as 5 1/2. Dermablend should explain this change and post a chart with old vs new shade numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for a foundation that offers a fluid coverage and stays on. Living in the desert, the summers can be really difficult on foundation. Dermablend doesn't sweat off and the sun protection is just an added bonus. Overall I am extremely happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Foundation will keep buying!
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation!. I've been using it for years. It looks great and makes my skin look smooth and flawless. i get compliments on my skin all the time. It's the only Foundation I'll use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can control the coverage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this cover creme for more than 15 years. I love that you can control the coverage... I’d recommend applying dabs with your fingers for spot coverage or using a foundation brush to apply as an all over foundation makeup. One container lasts me for almost a year using it this way. Stays on well in water and provides good sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product... been using it for years
customer_reviews.text: I love Dermablend. I have been using it for many years and it never fails me. Great cover. Since I began using this I have been working on improving my skin and don't need heavy coverage so I just thin it out with a little moisturizer and primer. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: hipd

customer_reviews.title: Great Makeup Know Your Exact Skin Color Buy with White Setting Powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but during pandemic couldn’t go into store. For first time users go into store to try on colors first hand. Also for best effect get Setting Powder no matter what your skin color is White Setting Powder works better and lasts longer .
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Way to thick.
customer_reviews.text: Too thick, very difficult to evenly put on. Thick and color wasn’t very good. Would not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy C.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS !
customer_reviews.text: I first use this product about 10 years ago it covered up a few scars that I had from chickenpox and just gave me a very smooth looking skin tone. I am constantly getting compliments on how beautiful my skin is. I'm 70 years Young!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Received my Dermablend today. I was disappointed with the shade (wrong choice - too dark), should have gotten an Ivory shade. This shade, while in the same family was VERY dark for me. In addition, it's not as moisturizing as indicated. Granted, I'm a mature woman of 56, with very good skin, hydrated. I do have some under eye darkness which I though this would help. I had to slather on additional cream with this product to lighten the color AND add more moisture. I will not purchase again. Quite disappointed. Even if I did have the correct color.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Adopter

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, and it protects your skin from the sun. I use a brush to apply the DermaBlend, and it looks flawless. As for moisturizing your face, this product does not. I've been using this brand for 6 years or so.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Dermablend Cover Creme
customer_reviews.text: Well, I can't live without this, due to my acne scars. It certainly does the job. It matches my skin color perfectly, and lasts almost 10 hours. It's easy to apply, has no scent, fits in my purse, and is just great! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: devoted2as

customer_reviews.title: It didn't do so well in the summer months (I was melting even with Powder ) but as it got colder omg great great cover smooth
customer_reviews.text: Just started using Dermablend after transitioning from MaryKay. It didn't do so well in the summer months (I was melting even with Powder ) but as it got colder omg great great cover smooth. My nose shines around late afternoon but over all love the products.Finding the right color is a work in process. have to mix; thats ok. great
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: I always have dermablend make-up base on hand.
customer_reviews.text: My third purchase of this thicker more coverage make-up base. It gives a flawless finish. It you have any discoloration it will cover. I apply with a brush thin for quick application and to make it look more blended. It’s not too dry but has a light moisture.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for scars and tatoos
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for TATOOS and scars , this color is for those skin yellow based skin tones .think tone of Jennifer Aniston and Angelina Jolie, and not for pink undertones as in Rene Zellwegger and Nicole Kidman
customer_reviews.author: CDavi

customer_reviews.title: There are cheaper products that work better.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend says it works great, but that there are other products on the market for half the cost that actually work better for covering up skin spots.
customer_reviews.author: 3D pro User

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't match my color/too mouse like
customer_reviews.text: Too mouse like. Basically whipped and did NOTHING for my skin. All of the colors had some gross orange tone.
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Megan Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Thin, cakey, overpriced, waaaayyyyy too light, color chart in product description is way off. Cannot wait until it's out of my sight.
customer_reviews.author: Britany Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Needs a darker shade
customer_reviews.text: Just like the department stores sell. Just wish it came in a darker shade. I have vitiligo and I have really dark skin. The cosmetic industry does not recognize people of really dark color.
customer_reviews.author: KevinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Manufactures should do more lab research to match black ladies color tones!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream I used it many years ago, and decided to get more. I was not disappointed! It goes on pretty smooth, the only issue was the color tone didn't match exactly but it came pretty close. Thanx!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Smears everywhere :(
customer_reviews.text: Full coverage however the down side is that it is very messy and smears everywhere. It smears on my nails whenever I touch my face, counter tops, clothing etc. never had this issue before with other foundations
customer_reviews.author: Classicrebel

customer_reviews.title: Camo!
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage for bruising after accident. Very little bleed-thru at the end of the day. Use with the powder to enhance coverage
customer_reviews.author: Shell

product_meta.title: Dermablend Cover Creme Full Coverage Cream Foundation with SPF 30, 1 Oz
product_meta.description:
Color:70W Olive Brown: For tan to deep skin with warm undertones and a hint of bronzeLightweight creme formula with high purity pigments and natural skin tones. Cover creme delivers a flawless complexion and 12 hours of consistent color wear. Glides on evenly. Delivers all day hydration. Skin looks fresh, feels soft and velvety smooth.

BRAND STORY
Dermablend is powerful makeup for all; high-performance pigments available in a wide shade range. A dermatologist created brand with high safety standards: fragrance-free, allergy-tested, sensitive skin tested, non-comedogenic.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
